definitions.body: :Ez Eze 29:18 hire, wages, only sg., not c. art.;—abs. ´[[שׂ]]: Nu 18:31 +, cstr. [[שְׂכַר]] De 15:18 +, sf. [[שְׂכָרִי]] Ge 30:18 +, etc.;—

wages, of servant, Ge 30:28, Ge 30:32, Ge 30:33 (J), Ge 31:8, Ge 31:8, Ex 2:9 (all E), De 15:18 ([[שָׂכִיר]] ´[[שְׂ]]:), De 24:15, 1Ki 5:20, Zec 8:10, Mal 3:5 ([[שָׂכִיר]] ´[[שְׂ]]:); soldiers Ez Eze 29:18, Eze 29:19; shepherd (symb.) Zec 11:12, Zec 11:12; beast Ex 22:14 (E), Zec 8:10.

= reward, for work done, faithfulness, etc., Ge 15:1 (JE), Ge 30:18 (E) in expl. of name [[יששכר]], Nu 18:31 (P), [[כִּי]] [[לִפְעֻלָּתֵח]] ´[[יֵשׁ שׂ]]: Je 31:16 (cf, 2Ch 15:7), Is 40:10 = Is 62:11 (fig. of reward of ´[[י]]:’s labours), Ps 127:3, Ec 4:9, Ec 9:5.
